TopicTitle: When do you think the new dev diary is coming out, and when do you think its coming out?

Articles.Content: I think in about two months. and It might be about the KSC.

Love the title. I think we'll get a dev diary before two months. But I don't see the next feature video happening before then. To the best  of my knowledge we don't know how many feature videos are left, but I imagine there's one for colonies and one for multiplayer. If two more is the bare minimum, and we assume the game's release date is the first half of 2022, it most likely will be longer than two months before we get the next video.
Nate mentioned in the interview posted recently to the thread that he couldn't say much about multiplayer as there was something being prepared for a discussion coming soon.
I suspect sometime within a month, and sometime within a month.
ae we getting a new show and tell today?
